title: Augusta County: John Quincy Adams Nadenbousch to Hester J. Nadenbousch, August 30, 1865
summary: Nadenbousch writes his wife to report his safe arrival in Staunton. He discusses his business activities, including stamping and shipping tobacco. He says that business in Staunton is brisk, despite a shortage of money.
keywords: Family, Home Front, Women, American Civil War
